duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervising assigned shifts, and provides supervision to crew members in the absence of the General Manager
Completing administrative tasks (e.g. financial and inventory control, schedules, logging maintenance, etc.)
Creating and ensuring exceptional guest experiences
Ensuring compliance with all security, food safety, quality, and cleanliness standards
Maintaining cost controls and contributing to the sales/profit goals
Building your skills and leveraging the available tools to prepare yourself for a future General Manager role

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (GED) preferred.
